content.raw:
I'm wondering if we can't unify this somehow with the existing textbox that displays the exceptions?

I'm thinking it would then display the logging information for both the state machine and worker. Maybe it's too complicated because you don't want exceptions to get buried in worker logging messages \(say if a thread is still running in the worker\) and I'm not sure how you would display "worker has not responded for x seconds" messages in a way that made sense \(and didn't get buried\) but it seems kind of weird and non-intuitive to have two separate text boxes displaying various bits of information about the tab...
